Name: Blind Shot
About the game: / You play as a peculiar clumsy commando, sent to fight a horde of zombies in a jungle bunkers area. The hero resembles Rambo, but without the brains, the brawn and the survival skills... Ok, he only slightly resembles Rambo... Your actions will cause harm to your enemies as to yourself. Accidents happen often and tend to have serious consequences. Blind and armed, you cannot simply aim or move, only a convenient situation gives you the chance to effectively annihilate your opponent! Then even a blind shot becomes a deadly one. Collect coins, earn money, not only to buy new guns. Jump into the shop, test various weapons, eliminate zombies faster... Customize your hero! Compete with others, be the best!
